MainAPI micro-service
(micro-service, that handles most of the incoming requests)

all requests that has PathTemplate such as
Â "/api/v1/{requestedUserId}/requests/{everything}"
wil be redirected to RouterApi micro-service via Ocelot

.NET, Node.js.

All microservices have theirs
docker-compose configs to run in the containers.
CI/CD pipeline is also configured for all of them.
